CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="text"/>
<!--============================================================= This filter displays Miscellaneous Document Titles and Types =============================================================--> <xsl:template match="MiscellaneousDocument"> <xsl:apply-templates select="MiscellaneousDocumentTitle"/>;<xsl:text/> <xsl:apply-templates select="MiscellaneousDocumentMetadata/MiscellaneousDocumentType"/>
<xsl:if test="MiscellaneousDocumentMetadata/Language='Spanish'"> <xsl:text>;</xsl:text> <xsl:apply-templates select="MiscellaneousDocumentMetadata/Language"/> </xsl:if>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
